rules.ruleString: For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS1098, ATS2098, ATS3098, GRN1080, GRN2080, GRN3080} Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3098}

description: Component 1: A communicative language unit designed to further advanced writing, speaking and reading skills in German. The emphasis is on correct and appropriate use of structure, styles and registers across a variety of topics.Component 2: Will focus on the literary, artistic and intellectual developments in modern German and Austrian culture.
